name: DTPS Robot Program
summary: Learn about .RPG files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Panasonic DTPS allows those working with certain Panasonic welding robots, such as the TM-1400, to design programs those robots can execute. For example, a user can design a program that specifies and automates how a robot welds a standard set of parts together into a single component.

After creating a program, users save that program as an RPG file. They then transfer this compiled, binary file to a robot's controller device (such as the G3 Robot Controller), from which they can execute the program the RPG file contains.

instructions: RPG files are not meant to be opened. To use an RPG file with a compatible Panasonic welding robot, transfer the RPG file to that robot's controller. For example, you can transfer an RPG file to the G3 Robot Controller used with the TM-1400 welding robot. Then, you can use the controller to execute the program the RPG file contains.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
